body:
School necromancy [evil]

Level magus 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4

Duration 1 hour/level

Saving Throw Fortitude negates

Spell Resistance yes

Target Restrictions selected

The target of a wordspell with this effect word takes 1d4 temporary negative levels. If these negative levels cause the subject to die, it rises as a ghost 1d4 days later unless buried in consecrated ground.
name: Life Leech
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Death Words/Life Leech

sections.body: The negative levels from a wordspell with this effect word are permanent. Boosting this effect word increases its level by 5.
sections.name: Boost
